name: The Adventures of Noddy the Nomadic Parasite
name_original: The Adventures of Noddy the Nomadic Parasite
description:
Noddy the parasite lives a nomadic life, infesting and controlling the minds of human after human.  But Noddy had a problem, every time he infested a human, they quickly died!  Help Noddy in his quest to find the perfect human by solving puzzles while stealthily avoiding detection!

A top-down stealth puzzle game made for the Godot Wild Jam #29.

Theme: Nomad.

Wildcards: Better, faster, stronger (have acquirable upgrades in your game)

NOTE: PLEASE PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR THE BEST POSSIBLE EXPERIENCE (SOUND AND MUSIC IS BETTER, THE GAME RUNS SMOOTHER, AND YOUR PROGRESS IS SAVED).
